metadata.Title: CVE-2023-36479 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Eclipse Jetty Canonical Repository is the canonical repository for theJetty project. Users of the CgiServlet with a very specific commandstructure may have the wrong command executed. If a user sends a request toa org.eclipse.jetty.servlets.CGI Servlet for a binary with a space in itsname, the servlet will escape the command by wrapping it in quotationmarks. This wrapped command, plus an optional command prefix, will then beexecuted through a call to Runtime.exec. If the original binary nameprovided by the user contains a quotation mark followed by a space, theresulting command line will contain multiple tokens instead of one. Thisissue was patched in version 9.4.52, 10.0.16, 11.0.16 and 12.0.0-beta2.

criterions.comment: jetty package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
